wybug_title: Udemy某业务弱口令导致主站沦陷
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-01-22：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-01-27：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 在我的记忆中有一个网站，Udemy……那是一个南方的寒冬，摄氏 9 度，喝着生姜味汽水，看着 Udemy 的视频，我了解到了 Gephi，一个不错的数据分析工具。后来，工作正好用到；又是一年春天，我来到了北方，北京的街道上漫天飞絮，我的心情有点蓝蓝的，朋友说，Udemy 帐号付了费，你可以学点东西，你需要继续前行……今天，一个北方寒冬里的星期三，摄氏 - 1 度，暖气让人觉得有点热。这次，依然是通过 Udemy 学习，不过是学 Hacking。————————————————————————————————There is a website in my memory, Udemy.I remembered that, in a cold southern winter, being in 9 ℃,  drinking the ginger ale，watching Udemy's video, I learned about Gephi which is a data-analysing tool.  And it's exactly fit for my later work.It's another spring. I came to the north, walking on Beijing's street，seeing the flying catkins all over the air，I felt so blue. My friend told me, there is a Udemy pro account, so you can learn something from it. You should keep moving on.Today, it's a Wednesday in the freezing northern winter. being in -1 ℃, the heating made me feel a little hot.This time, still by Udemy, I'm learning. However, I'm learning hacking.  详细说明：  我发现 Udemy 博客有几个弱口令帐号。I found some administrators' passwords of this blog are weak. （地址/Address: http://www.udemy.com/blog）e.g, usrname: Onur pwd: udemy因此我利用以上弱口令登入了 Udemy 博客后台。如你所见，我们能通过修改 pugin code 来 getshell 了So I made use of this weak password and access to Udemy blog's dashboard.As you could see, we could edit the plugin code and getshell.我修改了 google-sitemap-plugin/google-sitemap-plugin.php  (见于下方图示)另外，我没做任何破坏 ：）I changed google-sitemap-plugin/google-sitemap-plugin.php  (see the chart below )as an aside, I did not do any damage. ：）   漏洞证明：  



   修复方案：  kill all weak passwords!   版权声明：转载请注明来源 新一葛格@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-01-27 12:12 厂商回复：  最新状态： 暂无
